intro.answer: Hello, I am Percy and I am just out here trying to help!

questions: What are the usage limits for the free plan?
free-plan.answer: Deploys on the free plan get 1GB memory and 1GB disk usage (soft limit, hard cap of 10 GB). For additional details, please visit: https://railway.app/legal/fair-use

db-backups.answer: We backup databases every 24 hours. Currently, there's no option in the UI to download a backup but if you reach out to us, we can get one for you.

custom-domains.answer: Yes, you can set up multiple custom domains per project and per environment! Details: https://docs.railway.app/deployment/custom-domains

questions: How do I SSH into my application?
Can I SSH into the server?
ssh.answer: That's going to be a no from me, chief. We don't support or encourage SSH-ing into the server.

questions: Does Railway support the EU region?
Where are the Railway servers located?
region.answer: Current we only support US West but we're working on adding other regions. Follow this ticket to stay updated: https://feedback.railway.app/feature-requests/p/eu-region-support

monorepo.answer: Not yet but we'd like to. Hopefully soon!

questions: Can I use docker compose on Railway?
docker.answer: You can use a Dockerfile with Railway but we do not support using docker-compose at this moment. Details: https://docs.railway.app/deployment/builds#dockerfiles

questions: My app works locally but says `Bad Gateway` when I deploy!?!
bad-gateway.answer: Did you configure the correct PORT variable? More information: https://docs.railway.app/deployment/up#port-variable

questions: Where do I submit a feature request?
feature-requests.answer: You can submit a feature request here: https://feedback.railway.app/

questions: Why am I seeing that my account needs to be verified?
account-verification.answer: We have determined that your account requires additional information to host on Railway. Make sure to link a GitHub account and wait 24 hours for the verification check to pass.

questions: What am I allowed to host on Railway?
fair-use.answer: You can see our Fair Use policy to determine what you can host: https://railway.app/legal/fair-use

questions: I found a bug. Where can I report it?
bug-reporting.answer: You can report bugs here: https://feedback.railway.app/bug-reports

questions: I am reaching my free plan limits. How do I upgrade my account?
free-plan-limits.answer: You can upgrade on your Account Management portal under the Billing tab: https://railway.app/account/billing

questions: How do I configure Two-Factor Authentication?
two-factor.answer: You can! You can set up a TOTP tool under your Account Security page: https://railway.app/account/security

usage-calc.answer: We calculate RAM and CPU usage to the minute. Our rates are $0.000231 / GB / minute for RAM and $0.000463 / vCPU / minute for compute.

questions: Can I change my account email?
account-email.answer: Yes, you will need to contact us directly to do so. contact (at) railway (dot) app
